attributes.action: Seek a means of vetting and legislating animal breeders.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Due to the enormous strain being placed upon animal rescue shelters, and the lack of real accountability of animal breeders.
I seek to ask this government to raise a means of vetting persons or organisations who seek to profit from animal breeding.
Furthermore, I would urge this government to license all persons who would seek to profit from such a trade.
I feel it would restrict the growth of "council house breeders" who only seek to earn an illegal income whilst claiming government benefits.
